p: Chips made of Si and glass can be cleaned using solutions such as piranha (H 2SO 4/H 2O 2), since the solution performs the mineralization of organic materials, and no RNA/DNA can be left behind. Nevertheless, general practitioners prefer disposable systems because they are safer in terms of cross-contamination. In the future, PCR chips could well be able to be cleaned and reused, once the cleaning process has shown its consistency.
